channel.title: 2007PVP - WreckScape
channel.description:

PLAY [url=http://wreckscape.no-ip.org/]WreckScape #Main Page[/url] [url=http://wreckscape.p.ht/highscores/]Hiscores[/url] [url=http://wreckscape.no-ip.org/]Forum[/url] [url=http://wreckscape.no-ip.org/play.php/]WEB-CLIENT[/url] [url=http://wreckscape.p.ht/client.jar]DOWNLOAD-CLIENT[/url]
Dedicated Staff, Weekly Updates, 24 Hours Bug Fix, SERVER SKILL RATE 40x, Lag Free
[b]Server features: ~Skills trainable~
~Instant Combat Level~ [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img833/7605/3fb.png[/img]
~Mini-games~ (duel arena,fight pits,fight cave,castle wars,custom mini-games) ~Good Economy~ ~Smart Shops for Starter~ ~Vote System~ ~Game Point's System~ ~Master Capes~ ~Pk Zone~ (safe, danger zones,wild zones) ~Different City's around Runescape~ ~Quests~ [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img829/4109/4qu.png[/img] ~Mystery Box~ ~Lure Allowed~
MEDIA: [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img17/9468/nfxv.png[/img]

item.title: 2007PVP - WreckScape
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

By having line shops and set-able skills, you have just removed basically every reason for anyone to stay on this server for longer than a few days. I would suggest creating a decently stable xp rate, adding some GOOD places to train (not lined up monsters) in some locations around Runescape, and introduce skilling so that players can make their own gear rather than just buying it.

Read full topic

item.title: 2007PVP - WreckScape
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Your quests look pretty good I’ll log on and check them out. Why don’t you make the items in the Pure Gear shop unlimited rather than 100k? It would look a bit better in my opinion.

Read full topic
